meanings.definition: A member of a legislative assembly.
meanings.sent1: The assemblymen gathered to discuss new laws.
meanings.sent2: The assemblymen voted on the proposed bill.
meanings.sent3: The assemblymen joked about having a 'bring your pet to work' day.
meanings.sent4: The assemblymen were the architects of change in the city.
meanings.sent5: The assemblymen worked tirelessly to represent their constituents.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of assemblymen walking into the government building.
meanings.sent2: The assemblymen were dressed in formal attire for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The assemblymen decided to have a pizza party to celebrate their successful session.
meanings.sent4: The assemblymen stood united in their commitment to serve the people.
meanings.sent5: The assemblymen's dedication to their duties was truly admirable.
